title: when i get into game it says its loading then i get 100% and it says ur internet is not working but
body: thats not ttue because im talking to my friends on discord

replies.body:
It means your connection to League isn't working, which can still be your internet, just not all your internet. You can try some of the steps here and see if any of them help you.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection
